name: Patched
description:
This 2.5D platformer was made in 72 hours during this year's Global Game Jam! What you are playing is the submitted product. I really like this game and plan to add some slight adjustments (including a WebGL build), but for now please enjoy the original product. 

Can also be found directly on the  GGJ website here: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/patched-
